select * from nfcpatrol.t_nfcpatrol_record where 1 = 1
and person LIKE CONCAT('%', #{queryByPerson}, '%')
and rfid = #{rfid}
and #{queryBegin}::timestamp <= (dotime::timestamp)
and (dotime::timestamp) <= #{queryEnd}::timestamp
order by dotime desc
